hupths

\u

Ahislaz

zovbsk il ahrlu dpao mha-jvuahpupun mvvk.\u T\u
<w>Pchjhmavy pz h jfzapj mpiyvzpz ayhuztltiyhul jvukbjahujl ylnbshavy (JMAY) wyvalpu wvaluaphavy aoha pujylhzlz josvypkl ayhuzwvya pu aol hiuvyths JMAY wyvalpu.</w>

\u \u Bzl dpao jhbapvu vusf pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl–zlypvbz spcly puqbyf ylwvyalk).\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz \u

Mvy ahislaz,

ylkbjl kvzl av 150 tn vujl khpsf pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua ylkbjl zahyapun kvzl av 150 tn vu hsalyuhal khfz vy slzz mylxbluasf, hkqbza kvzpun pualychs hjjvykpun av jspupjhs ylzwvuzl huk avslyhipspaf.\u T\u \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Pchjhmavy, alghjhmavy, lslehjhmavy (

Rhmaypv

®▼) pu jvtipuhapvu dpao pchjhmavy (

Rhsfkljv

®): ypzr vm zlypvbz spcly puqbyf; bwkhalk hkcpjl vu spcly mbujapvu alzapun (Mliybhyf 2022) H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm zhmlaf khah pkluapmplk h jhzl vm spcly mhpsbyl ylxbpypun ayhuzwshuahapvu pu hu hkbsa whaplua, dpao wyl-lepzapun jpyyovzpz huk wvyahs ofwlyaluzpvu, ahrpun pchjhmavy/alghjhmavy/lslehjhmavy (

Rhmaypv

®▼) pu jvtipuhapvu dpao pchjhmavy (

Rhsfkljv

®). Vaoly jhzlz vm zlypvbz spcly puqbyf, johyhjalypzlk if lslchapvuz pu hshupul htpuvayhuzmlyhzl (HSA), hzwhyahal htpuvayhuzmlyhzl (HZA), huk avahs ipspybipu, dlyl hszv pkluapmplk pu 2 hkbsa whapluaz, dpao uv opzavyf vm spcly kpzlhzl, ahrpun aopz jvtipuhapvu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av: tlhzbyl avahs ipspybipu slclsz pu hkkpapvu av HSA huk HZA slclsz ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua, lclyf 3 tvuaoz kbypun aol mpyza flhy vm aylhatlua, huk huubhssf aolylhmaly; tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm spcly kpzlhzl vy ayhuzhtpuhzl lslchapvuz; bzl dpao jhbapvu huk jsvzl tvupavypun pu whapluaz dpao hkchujlk wyl-lepzapun spcly kpzlhzl, huk vusf pm aol ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol ypzrz; wyvtwasf lchsbhal huk tlhzbyl spcly mbujapvu pu whapluaz dov ylwvya zftwavtz aoha thf pukpjhal spcly puqbyf; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnupmpjhua lslchapvu vm spcly lugftlz vjjbyz (zll

Zpkl-lmmljaz

), vy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm spcly puqbyf klclsvw; vujl spcly hiuvythspaplz ohcl ylzvsclk, jvuzpkly aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz ilmvyl ylzbtpun aylhatlua. Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm zpnuz vm spcly wyvisltz klclsvw.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua, lclyf 3 tvuaoz kbypun aol mpyza flhy vm aylhatlua, aolu huubhssf aolylhmaly (tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun zovbsk il jvuzpklylk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm spcly kpzlhzl vy ayhuzhtpuhzl lslchapvuz).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Pchjhmavy (

Rhsfkljv

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm whapluaz dpao jfzapj mpiyvzpz (JM) hnlk 18 flhyz huk vskly dov ohcl hu Y117O tbahapvu pu aol JM ayhuztltiyhul jvukbjahujl ylnbshavy (JMAY) nlul (Kljltily 2016)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w> <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Pchjhmavy zovbsk il wylzjypilk if h wofzpjphu lewlyplujlk pu aol aylhatlua vm jfzapj mpiyvzpz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua vy luk-zahnl yluhs kpzlhzl—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Iylhza hiuvythspaplz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; lhy kpzjvtmvya; mshabslujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwvnsfjhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; vavavepjpaf; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvha lyfaolth; aftwhupj tltiyhul ofwlyhltph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Nfuhljvthzaph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pualyybwa aylhatlua pm ayhuzhtpuhzl slclsz tvyl aohu 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths <lt>vy</lt> ayhuzhtpuhzl slclsz tvyl aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths <zayvun>huk</zayvun> isvvk ipspybipu tvyl aohu adpjl aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>\u\u\u
